title: Animal And Human Bites
content:
**
**Signs of infection include:**  
---  
  * a fever – temperature of 38 degrees C or above
  * sweating or chills
  * swelling or redness around the wound
  * red streaks spreading out from the wound
  * a yellow or brown discharge (pus) from the wound
  * swollen glands under your chin or in your neck, armpits or groin.

**Get medical help as soon as possible if you think your wound is infected.**
